Rulings.Base: 1. This card targets ANY removed from play Level 5 or lower Beast-Type or Winged Beast-Type monster, including your opponent's.\n2. You cannot Special Summon the target monster to your opponent's side of the field.\n3. You cannot activate "Unicorn Beacon" while "Imperial Iron Wall" is active, and if "Imperial Iron Wall" is Chained to "Unicorn Beacon", you won't remove from play 1 card in your hand or Special Summon the selected monster.
